headline: AAR Q1 Earnings Beat Estimates, Sales Increase Year Over Year
summary: AAR posts first-quarter fiscal 2026 earnings of $1.08 per share, beating estimates, as sales climb 11.8% on strong Parts Supply growth.

headline: RTX's Pratt & Whitney completes critical engine testing for Collaborative Combat Aircraft
summary: Pratt & Whitney, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has completed critical testing on its small turbofan engine family for use on Collaborative Combat Aircraft, or CCAs. Testing confirms that the business can increase thrust on these existing engines for use on CCA platforms.

raw.headline: RTX's Pratt & Whitney completes critical engine testing for Collaborative Combat Aircraft

headline: Is RTX Share Price Justified After European Airport Hack Disruptions?
summary: Thinking about what to do with RTX stock? You are definitely not alone. With defense headlines popping up and another impressive stretch for the share price, a lot of investors are asking whether now is the time to grab a piece of the action, or if this is a moment to wait on the sidelines. RTX has delivered a stellar run in recent years, with a return of 213.6% over the past five years and a 112.5% jump in the last three. Even just this year, shares have surged 38.4%, with momentum carrying...

headline: RTX's Raytheon completes Ground-Launched StormBreaker速 test
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has completed a test for a ground-launched variant of the StormBreaker速 smart weapon. The business designed, developed and tested the new variant in 50 days.

headline: RTX's Raytheon and Avio USA expand collaboration to accelerate Mk 104 rocket motor production
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, and Avio USA have executed a purchase order for funding of up to $26 million for continued engineering work on the Mk 104 dual-thrust rocket motor to support Raytheon's Standard Missile franchise.
